[http://code.google.com/p/sharedmind SharedMind] is a collaborative version of [http://freemind.sourceforge.net/wiki/index.php/Main_Page FreeMind] mind mapping software. It uses [http://code.google.com/p/momocomm/ MoMoComm] as the communication library. SharedMind has been developed by researchers from the [http://sands.sce.ntu.edu.sg/ SANDS] research group at NTU Singapore.
